ChildRecordsR 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Signal detection theory to compare two annotators

Source: R/SDT_raterData.R
SDT.raterData.Rd

Provide a SDT indicator to compare two rater and graph

SDT.raterData(raterData, raters, plot = TRUE, summary = TRUE)

Arguments

raterData

: a raterData class
raters

: a vector containing two string with the names of the two raters

Value

a Class, print a graph and return a list containing a confusion matrix class from caret package and a macro SDT indicator

Examples

library(ChildRecordsR)
path = "/mnt/94707AA4707A8CAC/CNRS/corpus/namibia-data/"
CR = ChildRecordings(path)

#> ###############################################
#> Hello Wellcome to the ChildRecordings R Project 
#> 
#> Your ChildRecording project path containe : 
#>  1720  annotations files 
#>  1720  are referenced in the metadata 
#>  5  coders were finded :  textgrid_m1 vtc textgrid_mm textgrid_ak textgrid_ac
#>  All files seems to be present and referenced in the metadata (good news ;) )
#> 
#>   379  metadata don't have a start recording time (a.k.a start.time) 
#> 	 therefore time indicators wil not be build for those files 
#> 	 more infos in ChildRecordings$integrity_test$missing.start.time 
#>   362  files are empty 
#> 	 This should normally mean that no annotation were provided by annotator 
#> 	 more infos in ChildRecordings$integrity_test$empty.files 

# finding segments on wav file for designated rater
raters <- c("textgrid_ak","textgrid_mm","textgrid_m1")
search <- find.rating.segment(CR,"aiku/namibie_aiku_20160715_1.wav",range_from = 27180, range_to = 27240)
ratting1  = aggregate.rating(search, CR, 0.1)

#> |==================                                                        | 25% time by step : 0s estimate duration : 0m remain : 0m 
#> |=====================================                                     | 50% time by step : 0s estimate duration : 0m remain : 0m 
#> |========================================================                  | 75% time by step : 0s estimate duration : 0m remain : 0m 
#> |==========================================================================|100% time by step : 0s estimate duration : 0m remain : 0m 
#> number of annotators 4 
#> length of reccording annotation 240 seconds or  0.06666667 hours
#> Reccord span  60 seconds or  0.01666667 hours
#> 
comp1 = raterComparaison(ratting1)

#> number of annotators 4 
#> length of reccording annotation 240 seconds or  0.06666667 hours
#> Record span  60 seconds or  0.01666667 hours
#>

SDT.raterData(comp1,c("textgrid_ak","textgrid_mm"))

#> Confusion matrix :
